name: ANIMAX
description:
ANIMAX is a 2D retro-styled platformer inspired by retro NES (Nintendo Entertainment System) and Famicom games like Metroid and Mega Man.

With your special suit you can switch between three different forms to help you navigate the dangerous levels, Blue for speed and long jumping, Green for high jumping and Red for shooting. Your mission is to get to the end and destroy the evil Power Core.

Are you brave enough to complete this task?

Game Features:

  • NES platformer gameplay and difficulty
  • Retro-styled graphics
  • Retro music and sound effects (from https://opengameart.org/)
